snippet: Nicholas B. Dirks, Columbia University’s executive vice president for arts and sciences and dean of the faculty, has been chosen to be chancellor of the University of California, Berkeley.
abstract: Nicholas B Dirks, Columbia University’s executive vice president for arts and sciences and dean of faculty, is chosen to be chancellor of University of California, Berkeley.
lead_paragraph: Nicholas B. Dirks, Columbia University’s executive vice president for arts and sciences and dean of the faculty, has been chosen to be chancellor of the University of California, Berkeley.
